Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    HW09_131044004 Definition: This is a class that represents a polynomial equations Polynomial represents a polynomial from algebra: e.g. 4x^3 + 3x^2 - 5x + 2 Class will keep the coefficients of the polynomial which are double

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polynomial()
      No-parameter constructor returns a polynomial of degree 0, with value 0
      Polynomial(double[] coefficient)
      Construct polynomial from double array of coefficients The coefficients are listed in order from highest to lowest degree The degree is the size of the array - 1.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial()
        No-parameter constructor returns a polynomial of degree 0, with value 0

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial(double[] coefficient)
        Construct polynomial from double array of coefficients The coefficients are listed in order from highest to lowest degree The degree is the size of the array - 1. Example: 7.1x^3 + 2.8x^2 + 3.4 would be represented as {7.1,2.8,3.4}
        Parameters:
        coefficient - double array of coefficients from largest degree down to smallest degree
